item.title: How to upload a file with Blazor SSR in .NET 8?
item.description: Blazor has built-in support for handling file uploads. If you’re using one of the interactive render modes (or .NET 7 or earlier) you can use the dedicated InputFile component and use that to get hold of a file from the user. You can then save that file somewhere (to disk, or the cloud).
